subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Yankees starter Kei Igawa allowed seven runs over four and a third innings while Alex Rodriguez homered twice, making him the first player to hit 14 in the first 18 games of a season.
snippet: Yankees starter Kei Igawa allowed seven runs over four and a third innings while Alex Rodriguez homered twice, making him the first player to hit 14 in the first 18 games of a season.
